com.buschmais.xo.api

Interface XOTransaction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XOTransactionImpl

    public interface XOTransaction
    Defines the interface for XOManager transactions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  XOTransaction.Synchronization
      Defines a transaction lifecycle callback which can be registered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void begin()
      Begin a transaction.
      void commit()
      Commit all changes of the current transaction.
      boolean isActive()
      Determine the state of the transaction associated with this XOManager.
      void registerSynchronization(XOTransaction.Synchronization synchronization)
      Register a XOTransaction.Synchronization.
      void rollback()
      Rollback all changes from the current transaction.
      void unregisterSynchronization(XOTransaction.Synchronization synchronization)
      Unregister a XOTransaction.Synchronization.

    • Method Detail

      • begin

        void begin()
        Begin a transaction.

      • commit

        void commit()
        Commit all changes of the current transaction.

      • rollback

        void rollback()
        Rollback all changes from the current transaction.

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Determine the state of the transaction associated with this XOManager.
        Returns:
        true if there is an active transaction.
